summary: All UI fixes verified successfully. Global AppHeader with Login/Register/Buy Tokens visible on all pages (landing, terms, privacy, cookies). Hero text 'HAVE YOU NEGOTIATED?' displays fully. About section bento grid renders properly. All legal pages load with full content. Footer legal links navigate correctly. Mobile menu toggles correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: AppHeader component correctly integrated in global layout.tsx
Header shows appropriate auth buttons (Login/Register/Buy Tokens) for unauthenticated users
Legal pages (terms, privacy, cookies) properly implemented with full content
Footer legal links correctly navigate to respective pages
Mobile menu toggle works correctly with proper animations
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI fixes from this iteration verified. Global header with auth buttons visible on all pages. Legal pages (terms, privacy, cookies) fully functional. Mobile menu works correctly.
